page.title: 16THE SOUTH WALES ARGUS.
page.content: The South Wales Argus is the only major evening paper in Gwent. It has now been in production for nearly 40 years. It is printed in Duffryn and has smaller sites scattered all over Gwent. The Argus has all the daily major information in it for South Wales and it sometimes has National News in it. This information is always set out in a set pattern. The first 5 to 6 pages contain all the main headlines. The next few pages are used for Births, Deaths and Marriages. Then comes several pages of Advertisememts. The last few pages are used for sports headliness and they also give the local football, cricket, snooker and darts tables.
